🚨Recovering America’s Wildlife Act passes out of committee 🚨
#RAWA would establish a new program – the Wildlife Conservation and Restoration Program – within the @USFWS to promote voluntary conservation efforts to restore and protect at-risk, threatened, or endangered species.

Great news, EPW advanced #RAWA! Sen. @MartinHeinrich & I introduced this bill that would
✅Boost our economy
✅Create more outdoor recreation opportunities
✅Conserve our natural heritage for future generations

Recovering America’s Wildlife Act would invest in proactive, on-the-ground conservation work led by states, territories, and Tribal nations to support the long-term health of fish and wildlife habitat all across America.

We can better protect our land, waterways, & wildlife by encouraging states, territories, & Tribes to make significant contributions to voluntary conservation efforts. #RAWA would help preserve our nation’s wildlife for future generations.
